definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: avenge, take vengeance (Sir 46:1 e [[להנקם נקמי אויב]] (Niph. + acc. cogn.); [[נקם]], n. also Sir 12:6 (cf. De 32:41), Sir 39:30, Sir 48:7; NH [[נׇקַם]] esp. in deriv.; Aram. [[נְקַם]] (rare), nqam in der. species; Ar. naqama take vengeance (9alay upon), Lane:3037; cf. Eth.qim: Di:458 vindictae studium, ultionis cupido; As. iḳḳimu, vengeance, requital, is poss. from √ [[אקם]] Jäger:BAS ii. 279);—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: God subj. [[דַּם עֲבָדָיו יִקּוֹם]] De 32:43 the blood of his servants he avengeth (against those who slew them) (+ 1Ki 2:5 LXXL Klo); ´[[נ]] abs. Na 1:2, Na 1:2 c. [[לְ]] (agst. Nineveh) Na 1:2; [[נׇקָם]] ´[[נ]] (agst. Jerus.) Ez Eze 24:8; [[עַל־עֲלִילוֹהָם]] on their doings (his people's) Ps 99:8; [[נְקַם בְּרִית]] ´[[נ]] Le 26:25 (H) the vengeance of the covenant (against those who break it); [[נְקָמַנִי]]1Sa 24:13, c. [[מִן]] of pers. from whom vengeance is taken (cp. Je 20:10).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Israel and its leaders against their enemies, [[נקמה]] ´[[נ]] c. [[מִן]] against whom Nu 31:2 (P); c. acc. [[יִקּׂם אׂיְבָיו]] Jos 10:13 (poem).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: Edom against Judah [[נקם לְ]] ´[[נ]] Ez Eze 25:12.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: in administration of justice agst. murder Ex 21:20 (E).
entertain revengeful feelings (opp. [[אהב]]) against neighbour forbidden Le 19:18 (H).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: ´[[י]] subj. c. [[מִן]] of adversary Is 1:24, Je 46:10; c. [[מִן]] advers., [[לְ]] for whom Je 15:15; c. [[בְּ]] adversary Je 50:15.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of Israel and champions c. [[מִן]] Ju Jdg 16:28, 1Sa 14:24, Es 8:13; c. [[בְּ]] Ju Jdg 15:7, 1Sa 18:25.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of enemies against Israel [[נקם]] ´[[נ]] Ez Eze 25:15; c. [[בְּ]] Ez Eze 25:12.
suffer vengeance (of law against murder) Ex 21:20 (E).

definitions.title: Piel
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. [[נִקַּ֫מְתִּי]] 2Ki 9:7, Je 51:36; —avenge, ´[[י]] subj. [[דָּמִים מיד]] 2Ki 9:7 blood at hands of; [[נִקְמָתְֵ]] ´[[נ]] Je 51:36 take vengeance for thee.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יֻקַּם]] Ge 4:24, Ex 21:21, [[יֻקָָּם]] Ge 4:15 be avenged, vengeance be taken (for blood).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[תִּתְנַקֵּם]] Je 5:9, Je 5:29, Je 9:8; Pt. [[מִתְנַקֵּם]] Ps 8:3, Ps 44:17; avenge oneself, ´[[י]] subj. [[לאׁ תִתְנַקֵּם]] ´[[נַפְשִׁי בְּ]] Je 5:9, Je 5:29, Je 9:8; of Israel's enemies [[אוֹיֵב]] [[וּמִתְנַקֵּם]] Ps 8:3, Ps 44:17.
